pages.text: $(li)The Goblin Crown once equipped inflicts the effect $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/weakness)Weakness$(/l) II to any Goblin or Ogre near you and $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/weakness)Weakness$(/l) I to other creatures, reducing the damage of their attacks.$(br)$(li)It can only be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_keep)Ruined Keep$(/l).
